desc: The Wikimedia Commons Android app allows users to upload pictures from their Android phone/tablet to Wikimedia Commons
The Wikibase Design System and home of WMDE-supported component implementations.
A suite of tools to analyze page, user and project data of MediaWiki websites
The collaborative editing software that runs Wikipedia. Mirror from https://gerrit.wikimedia.org/g/mediawiki/core. See https://mediawiki.org/wiki/Developer_access for contributing.
Convert Wikipedia database dumps into plaintext files
